A '''Nether brick slab''' is a [[Nether Bricks|Nether brick]] variant of a [[slab]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Nether brick slabs can be mined using any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, they drop nothing.

{{breaking row
|Nether Brick Slab
|Pickaxe

|item=1

== Usage ==
{{for|information about the placement mechanics of all slabs|Slab#Usage}}
Despite their appearance, top and double Nether brick slabs ''do not'' qualify as Nether brick blocks for the purposes of [[Nether fortress]] mob spawning in {{JE}}. 

=== Crafting ingredient ===
{{crafting usage}}

=== Note blocks ===
Nether brick slabs can be placed under [[note block]]s to produce "bass drum" sounds.
